title: Not Being able to interact (FIX)
body:
So riot decided to post this fix to their twitter instead of their Help and Support forums.

"Hey playas! ğ˜ğ˜¦ğ˜µ ğ˜ªğ˜µ...ğ˜¤ğ˜¶ğ˜» ğ˜ºğ˜°ğ˜¶'ğ˜³ğ˜¦ ğ˜±ğ˜­ğ˜¢ğ˜ºğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜´?  We're seeing an issue where you're unable to interact with the game during a match. Disabling Discord overlay or pressing the overlay keybind should help fix this. Here's how"    http://prntscr.com/i3onw0

replies.body:
We've also had this globally stickied for a bit now as well!

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/F1goweJo-i-cant-interact-with-the-game
